sn36.8:1.1: Ekaṁ samayaṁ bhagavā vesāliyaṁ viharati mahāvane kūṭāgārasālāyaṁ.
sn36.8:1.2: Atha kho bhagavā sāyanhasamayaṁ paṭisallānā vuṭṭhito yena gilānasālā tenupasaṅkami; upasaṅkamitvā paññatte āsane nisīdi.
sn36.8:3.2: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu kāye kāyānupassī viharati ātāpī sampajāno satimā, vineyya loke abhijjhādomanassaṁ;
sn36.8:3.5: dhammesu dhammānupassī viharati ātāpī sampajāno satimā, vineyya loke abhijjhādomanassaṁ.
sn36.8:3.6: Evaṁ kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu sato hoti.
sn36.8:4.2: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu abhikkante paṭikkante sampajānakārī hoti …pe… bhāsite tuṇhībhāve sampajānakārī hoti.
sn36.8:4.3: Evaṁ kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu sampajāno hoti.
sn36.8:4.4: Sato, bhikkhave, bhikkhu sampajāno kālaṁ āgameyya.
sn36.8:5.1: Tassa ce, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno evaṁ satassa sampajānassa appamattassa ātāpino pahitattassa viharato uppajjati sukhā vedanā.
sn36.8:5.4: sā ca kho paṭicca, no appaṭicca.
sn36.8:5.7: Ayaṁ kho pana phasso anicco saṅkhato paṭiccasamuppanno.
sn36.8:5.8: Aniccaṁ kho pana saṅkhataṁ paṭiccasamuppannaṁ phassaṁ paṭicca uppannā sukhā vedanā kuto niccā bhavissatī’ti.
sn36.8:5.9: So phasse ca sukhāya ca vedanāya aniccānupassī viharati, vayānupassī viharati, virāgānupassī viharati, nirodhānupassī viharati, paṭinissaggānupassī viharati.
sn36.8:5.10: Tassa phasse ca sukhāya ca vedanāya aniccānupassino viharato, vayānupassino viharato, virāgānupassino viharato, nirodhānupassino viharato, paṭinissaggānupassino viharato yo phasse ca sukhāya ca vedanāya rāgānusayo, so pahīyati.
sn36.8:6.1: Tassa ce, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno evaṁ satassa …pe…
sn36.8:6.6: sā ca kho paṭicca, no appaṭicca.
sn36.8:6.10: Kāyassa bhedā uddhaṁ jīvitapariyādānā idheva sabbavedayitāni anabhinanditāni sītībhavissantī’ti pajānāti.
sn36.8:7.1: Seyyathāpi, bhikkhave, telañca paṭicca vaṭṭiñca paṭicca telappadīpo jhāyeyya,
sn36.8:7.2: tasseva telassa ca vaṭṭiyā ca pariyādānā anāhāro nibbāyeyya;
sn36.8:7.3: evameva kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu kāyapariyantikaṁ vedanaṁ vedayamāno ‘kāyapariyantikaṁ vedanaṁ vedayāmī’ti pajānāti. Jīvitapariyantikaṁ vedanaṁ vedayamāno ‘jīvitapariyantikaṁ vedanaṁ vedayāmī’ti pajānāti.
sn36.8:7.4: ‘Kāyassa bhedā uddhaṁ jīvitapariyādānā idheva sabbavedayitāni anabhinanditāni sītībhavissantī’ti pajānātī”ti.
